query: best hotels in San Francisco for women travelers
title: Best hotels in San Francisco for women travelers: Safe, clean, and great amenities
excerpt: Finding hotels that cater specifically to women travelers can be a daunting task, especially in a bustling city like San Francisco. This list is valuable because it highlights accommodations that prioritize safety, cleanliness, and exceptional amenities, ensuring a comfortable stay for solo female travelers or those exploring the city with friends. With the right hotel, women can feel empowered and secure while enjoying all that San Francisco has to offer.
intro: Discover the best hotels in San Francisco that provide a safe and welcoming environment for women travelers, complete with top-notch amenities.

hotels.name: Hotel Nikko San Francisco
hotels.description: Hotel Nikko San Francisco offers a luxurious stay in the heart of the city, featuring stunning views from every room and modern amenities for ultimate comfort. Guests can indulge in a unique culinary experience at the on-site restaurant, which serves a delightful fusion of American and Japanese dishes, with options for special dietary needs. With 24/7 multilingual staff ready to assist, your stay will be both seamless and enjoyable.
hotels.highlight: Offers stunning city views, a heated pool, and 24/7 multilingual concierge service for a seamless stay.

hotels.name: Taj Campton Place
hotels.description: Discover the elegant charm of Taj Campton Place, perfectly situated near Union Square and featuring two Michelin-star dining at the acclaimed Campton Place Restaurant. Each room offers a luxurious retreat, complete with a state-of-the-art sound system, cozy window seats, and sumptuous limestone bathrooms for ultimate relaxation. With its prime location and exceptional service, this hotel guarantees a memorable experience in the heart of the city.
hotels.highlight: Offers luxurious rooms with state-of-the-art sound systems, cozy window seats, and Michelin-star dining near Union Square.

hotels.name: San Francisco Marriott Marquis Union Square
hotels.description: Discover the elegance of San Francisco Marriott Marquis, situated adjacent to the Moscone Convention Center. Enjoy stylish rooms with modern amenities and breathtaking city views, as well as a well-equipped fitness center to maintain your routine. Savor a delightful breakfast at B55 Craft House and Kitchen, making this hotel the perfect blend of luxury and convenience for your downtown San Francisco experience.
hotels.highlight: Offers stylish rooms with modern amenities, a well-equipped fitness center, and on-site dining at B55 Craft House and Kitchen.

hotels.name: InterContinental Mark Hopkins San Francisco, an IHG Hotel
hotels.description: The InterContinental Mark Hopkins San Francisco is a historic landmark that combines luxury with breathtaking views of the Golden Gate Bridge. Guests can unwind in elegant rooms featuring modern amenities, while the Top of the Mark sky lounge offers a unique dining experience with an extensive martini menu and stunning city panoramas. With comprehensive facilities, including a 24-hour fitness center and business services, this hotel is perfect for both business and leisure travelers.
hotels.highlight: Features elegant rooms with modern amenities, a 24-hour fitness center, and a sky lounge offering stunning city views.

hotels.name: W San Francisco
hotels.description: Discover a modern urban oasis in the heart of San Francisco's SOMA District at W San Francisco. Enjoy luxurious rooms featuring high-tech amenities, including flat-screen TVs and Nespresso coffee, along with delightful local snacks and California wines. Indulge in sustainable dining at Trace and unwind with hand-crafted cocktails at the Living Room Bar, all while staying active in the FIT gym and exploring nearby attractions like the Golden Gate Bridge and Union Square.
hotels.highlight: Offers luxurious rooms with high-tech amenities, sustainable dining, a vibrant bar, and a well-equipped gym in the SOMA District.

hotels.name: Hotel G San Francisco
hotels.description: Experience the height of comfort at Hotel G San Francisco, where each contemporary room features luxurious amenities such as a Nespresso coffee machine and premium Metis toiletries. Ideally situated just steps from Union Square and cable car lines, this hotel provides easy access to the city's top attractions. Guests will also appreciate modern conveniences like a 42-inch Smart TV, air-conditioning, and a well-equipped techno gym for a truly enjoyable stay.
hotels.highlight: Offers contemporary rooms with luxurious amenities, a well-equipped techno gym, and convenient access to Union Square attractions.
